triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper examines how AI systems used in communication affect language and social relationships.

triples.name: Recommender system
triples.relevance: The paper investigates how algorithmic recommender systems (smart replies) change human interaction patterns.

triples.name: Randomized experiment
triples.relevance: The paper proposes two randomized experiments as the methodology to evaluate AI's social impacts.

triples.name: Communication
triples.relevance: The paper studies how AI affects daily communication and message-sending behavior.

triples.name: Language
triples.relevance: The paper proposes studying how algorithmic responses change language use and emotional language patterns.

triples.name: Interpersonal relationship
triples.relevance: The paper investigates how smart replies affect social relationships and interpersonal perceptions.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Smart reply systems rely on natural language processing to generate response suggestions.

triples.name: Sentiment analysis
triples.relevance: The paper examines changes in emotional language and positive sentiment in messages using algorithmic responses.

triples.name: Social perception
triples.relevance: The paper studies how people's perceptions of others change when they suspect algorithmic response usage.

triples.name: Human-centered computing
triples.relevance: The paper examines how AI interfaces for communication affect the interaction between humans and computer systems.
